remarks: Version of ~ hbsb3 with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Remark: the unbundled version of ~ nfs1 is given by ~ bj-nfs1v .)  (Contributed by BJ, 11-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-hbsb3v.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) $.
bj-hbsb3v $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> A. x [ y / x ] ph ) $.
$d x y $.
